unnormalised: Okay, so what's the deal with urban gym culture these days, eh? Seems like everyone in Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, even smaller cities like Pune is hitting the gym hard. It's become *the* thing, right?
normalised: Okay, so what's the deal with urban gym culture these days, eh? Seems like everyone in Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, even smaller cities like Pune is hitting the gym hard. It's become the thing, right?

unnormalised: I think a big part of it is just awareness. Dr. Sharma's talked about the importance of exercise for years, but now it's gone mainstream. Plus, Instagram is flooded with perfectly toned influencers and their protein shakes! #fitfam #gymlife and all that jazz.
normalised: I think a big part of it is just awareness. Doctor Sharma's talked about the importance of exercise for years, but now it's gone mainstream. Plus, Instagram is flooded with perfectly toned influencers and their protein shakes! hash fitfam hash gymlife and all that jazz.

unnormalised: But honestly, I think thereâ€™s more to it than just social media. It's also about stress relief. Life in the city is hectic, navigating traffic jams near Juhu beach and meeting deadlines. A good workout at Cult.fit or some local gym can be a great way to de-stress after a long day.
normalised: But honestly, I think thereâ€™s more to it than just social media. It's also about stress relief. Life in the city is hectic, navigating traffic jams near Juhu beach and meeting deadlines. A good workout at Cult.fit or some local gym can be a great way to de-stress after a long day.

unnormalised: Then there's the whole community aspect. You see the same faces, encourage each other, share workout tips, maybe even grab a post-workout chai. (Okay, maybe not chai, but you get the idea!).
normalised: Then there's the whole community aspect. You see the same faces, encourage each other, share workout tips, maybe even grab a post-workout chai. (Okay, maybe not chai, but you get the idea!).

unnormalised: Plus, letâ€™s be real, a good-looking physique doesnâ€™t hurt your chances on the dating scene. Gotta look good for those coffee dates at CCD, right?
normalised: Plus, letâ€™s be real, a good-looking physique doesnâ€™t hurt your chances on the dating scene. Gotta look good for those coffee dates at C C D, right?

unnormalised: Of course, some gyms can be pricey. Those fancy ones with all the imported equipment and 5000 sq ft of space charge a fortune, sometimes Rs. 10,000 a month! But there are plenty of affordable options too, even in posh areas like Koramangala.
normalised: Of course, some gyms can be pricey. Those fancy ones with all the imported equipment and five thousand square feet of space charge a fortune, sometimes rupees ten thousand a month! But there are plenty of affordable options too, even in posh areas like Koramangala.
